page.title: 18SOCIAL PROBLEMS
page.content: Many people believe that Port Glasgow'shigh unemployment causes many of the social problems in the area. Among the most common problems are vandalism, under-age drinking and domestic disputes. Vandalism takes many forms and is of great{social {concern}to people in the area. Types of{vandalism}are grafitti on walls, phone boxes wrecked, broken windows in schools and recently arson. Under-age drinking appears to be rising but{alcoholism}affects all age groups. This contributes to family disputes, disturbances and divorces. The District recently launched an anti-drink camaign. { Overcrowding}in certain areas of the town leads to further friction and despair and local authority and voluntary agencies are facing a difficult task in helping people cope.
